MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH3 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Croft Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  8:34 AM. Our engineers arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 Noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:58 AM on  19th March 2021.
